rds.vaadin.beanfaces.impl.introspection.annotations

Annotation Type UIFieldBinding


  • @Target(value=FIELD)
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface UIFieldBinding
    Annotation for binding a field (property of a bean). Used to hold metadatas used for UI generation.
    Author:
    Raphael Rougemont

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean booleanConvertedInTable
      Should this field value be translated when displayed in a table
      java.lang.String description
      Default description used for the field
      java.lang.String headerLabelInTable
      Default label used when in table column
      boolean hiddenColumnInTable
      Should this field be hidden when displayed in a table
      boolean hiddenInTable
      Should the field be hidden when displayed in a table
      java.lang.String label
      Default label used for the field
      UIFieldBinding.MODES mode
      Default display policy applied to this field
